greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The arithmetic function v_1(n,5).
reference: J. Butterworth, Examining the arithmetic function v_g(n,h). Research Papers in Mathematics, B. Bajnok, ed., Gettysburg College, Vol. 8 (2008).
link: Bela Bajnok, Additive Combinatorics: A Menu of Research Problems, arXiv:1705.07444 [math.NT], May 2017. See Table in Section 1.6.1.
program: def a(n): return int(n*max(int(floor((d - 2)/5) + 1)/d for d in divisors(n)))
print([a(n) for n in range(2, 101)]) # _Indranil Ghosh_, Jul 08 2017
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jul 07 2017
